text: [Music] we have been raised up doing farming though it looked like some kind of punishment so it never in my mind that i could do agriculture plural to urban migration is very common especially with the youth that is because of lack of employment after moving to the city and setting up a business and it collapsed which forced me to go back home that's when i can see it was very stressful i lost all my money and i came back at zero that's why my idea for moving to canada came i wanted to fly away we have mighty said that certain countries are better than ours and we think that if we go to that country we can make it big but right now i've come to learn that most of the people who goes abroad they don't really make a lot of money because once they come back they still go back to square one right now i've come to learn that agriculture has the potential to create many jobs because currently in africa we still have an opportunity to come up with business agribusinesses which can sustain our economy and improve our life rail i think the reason why agriculture is not attracting youth is low adoption of technology if technology is brought into agriculture it will bring high youth and more income lane fed agriculture on the other hand is very yes disease but due to thick seasons most of the produce go to waste but with the technology like this one thanks to how they gave me the drip system now i can able to produce events in dry seasons when the prices are good when i'm working my field it feels good to see the green crops growing you are their caretaker it's very good when you are seeing crops from driving healthy it feels good you
